changeSet.author: WeiChen
changeSet.sql: create table ledger_receipt ( id bigint constraint pk_ledger_receipt primary key, signed boolean, type varchar(20), range_type varchar(20), range_begin timestamp, range_end timestamp, stamp_tax boolean, time timestamp, created_by varchar(50), created_date timestamp, last_modified_by varchar(50), last_modified_date timestamp ); create index on ledger_receipt (id); create sequence ledger_receipt_seq start with 1 increment by 1;

create table ledger_receipt_printed_record ( id bigint constraint pk_ledger_receipt_printed_record primary key, ledger_receipt_id bigint constraint fk_ledger_receipt_printed_record_ledger_receipt_id references ledger_receipt, time timestamp, file_path varchar, file_name varchar, created_by varchar(50), created_date timestamp, last_modified_by varchar(50), last_modified_date timestamp ); create index on ledger_receipt_printed_record (id); create sequence ledger_receipt_printed_record_seq start with 1 increment by 1;
